title: Hundreds of S.Koreans cross border for final set of reunions
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Hundreds of South Koreans have crossed the border to North Korea for the second and final round of reunions of families separated by the 195... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
